parameters.content:
**Input format**

POST JSON:
{ "url": "https://example.com" }

If your sender posts:
{ "body": { "url": ["https://example.com"] } }
keep the existing expressions.

Otherwise, update expressions to match your payload shape.

**AI Model & Credentials**

Use n8n Credentials for OpenAI (Message a model).
Do NOT paste API keys directly into nodes.

The AI can summarize headers/body (truncated) to explain failures.

**Error Handling**

Network/DNS errors (e.g., getaddrinfo ENOTFOUND) are explained by the AI.
HTTP non-200 codes are treated as "down" and go to the Error email path.
Adjust IF logic if your service treats 3xx as OK.
